channel.title: Is there somthing wrong

item.title: Is there somthing wrong
item.dc:creator: @stormcutter stormcutter
item.description:
@stormcutter wrote:

when i put this code in my client.java it keeps giving me errors. Im sure i put the } and stuff in right place so whats wrong with it!

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“privacy”) && (playerRights == 3))
{
try {

		server.clientListener.close();

	} catch(IOException e) {

		sendMessage("Error with making the server private!");
	}

		}
